topic.title: Upnp open port works rarely
topic.body: I'm on version 0.3.4 (r667) and lately the port never opens.  Other upnp ports open fine with other programs.  I tried disabling windows firewall to see if that helped and still no luck.  It use to have no difficulties.  Is this a bug with the new version?

1_19kmumSX2kNumAfGJPgFtA28fs9bXSoZxh.body: BTW:  Not looking for brain storming in fixing the problem.   Just curious if it's a bug...    Maybe it will fix itself next version...
